post.body: If you're my dad how come I didn't inherit your 'i-look-like-a-muppet" gene? I guess it must skip a generation.
you are prince cul-de-sac
I've seen it already but you can never watch "Old Boy" enough times. One of the greatest fight scenes of modern cinema.

congrats kid!
Will's still one of my favorite actors but I could tell early on during the marketing push that the whole film was on his back.
haha, well the movie had the potential to be great but i really feel that the film relied on Will Smith's star-factor too much.
*facepalm* lol, well that would limit the level of enjoyment...
